name: ChineseHistoryInteractiveLecture
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chinese interactive lecture
des: Hello, welcome to your interactive Chinese History Learner. I am your personal tutor. It seems that you are either struggling to pass a Chinese history test or you are just a fan of the beautiful Chinese culture. No matter for what reason you come here for, I promise you the next 10 minutes will be your most efficient learning experience. This lecture includes Part one: The origin and formation of Chinese culture. Part two: The Qin Dynasty. Part three: Sui and Tang Dynasty. Part Four: The Rise of the Qing Dynasty. Part Five: The fall of the Great Qing and the Beginning of Modern Era. There will be more updates coming! Stay tuned!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
